overview: Award winning graphic web and print Creative Director and Founder of Wine & Food Travel. With a decade of interactive web and print design experience that includes projects for top entertainment studios (Warner Bros., Disney) for some of the most well-known properties in the world (Harry Potter, Scooby-Doo, Hannah Montana), Sonya Lee has built a solid reputation as a go-to consultant and hands-on Creative Director. She has also developed highly successful strategic branding projects for such corporate entities as Soapnet, AT&T and Powerbar. Sonya combines a keen understanding of user experience, interface development and branding strategy with Flash design expertise to execute the best possible solutions for projects of every size and scope, consistently delivered on-time and on-budget.
